page.title: 12IXWORTH BROWNIES
page.content: The Brownies meet at Ixworth Middle School on Wednesdays from 6.00pm to 7.15pm. We play games and sing songs. We go on pack holidays and have outings to nice places. We have to go on a coach. Our uniform is a brown cotton dress and a brown bobble hat. We have a brown belt and a purse fastened to it. We do pocket books. They are called pocket books because you should keep them in your pocket.The Brownies have been going on for 75 years now. I have been in the Brownies for 2 years so I am a seconder. This means I am second in charge of a group. A sixer is in charge of the whole group. The favourite game we play is called Hedgehogs.You put your hands over your eyes and the others hide. Two people have to find everybody else. When you find them you say their name.
